timeline.bodyText: @tristantarrant I didn't find a use case for this? Could you please help me on that ?

replies.bodyText: This is needed when using this out-of-tree. It must be kept
replies.author: tristantarrant

replies.bodyText: What means using this out-of-tree? What should be the test that must fail if we don't have this code?

replies.bodyText: Can you please try running your changes with https://github.com/tristantarrant/infinispan-playground-testdriver ?

replies.bodyText: I'd prefer doing this dynamically as there is no guarantee that the user id will stay constant and might also change depending on upstream/downstream/version/etc
